summary: 1993  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Russell Alan Hulse  is an American physicist and winner of the Nobel Prize in Physics, shared with his thesis advisor Joseph Hooton Taylor Jr., "for the discovery of a new type of pulsar, a discovery that has opened up new possibilities for the study of gravitation". He was a specialist in the pulsar studies and gravitational waves.
title: Russell Alan Hulse
